ai-patthana2.12:218.0.1_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana2.12:218.1_0: Nine deeds are the nine new deeds ...
ai-patthana2.12:219.1_0: corruption, corruption, and mind arise in them.
ai-patthana2.12:220.1_0: It’s just like that, corrupted by the defilements that gives rise to defilements, and doesn’t have no doubt or uncertainty regarding the defilements that cause or reasons.
ai-patthana2.12:221.1_0: And corruption, corrupted, and mental corruptions don’t arise for the sake of the defilements. It’s due to corruption, deluded, and uncertainty. It’s due to the ending of defilements. Those who have no doubts or uncertainties in the defects of doubt.
ai-patthana2.12:222.0.1_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana2.12:222.1_0: Neithers don’t put a new pair of robes in the nine orifices. They’re not produced in nine orifices, butter from the nine progressive producing nine news.
ai-patthana2.12:223.0_0: under the incomparable One’s construction with the border of associated (the Buddha),
ai-patthana2.12:223.1_0: And so, with the two, both the same, and the together with the lay person roamed and transmigrated by the other.
ai-patthana2.12:224.1_0: And the corruption, defilements, and corruption of the corruptions associated with the defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:225.1_0: And the corruption, defilements, and corruption of the corruption of the corruptions associated with the defilements. It is a cause and condition for the corruption of the defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:226.1_0: And the corruption, defilements, and corruption of the corruption of the defilements are corrupted, nor the cause and corruption of the defilements associated with the corruption of the defilements. They don’t give rise to the corruption of the defilements that gives rise to defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:227.1_0: It’s the reason why corruption, defilements, and corruption of the defilements arise, and the reason for the corruption of the defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:227.1_1: The roots are to be fatigued, (wholesome) corrupt, and the defilements don’t arise.
ai-patthana2.12:227.1_2: The roots are to be tired, and the aggregates associated with the defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:228.1_0: corruption, defilements, and things don’t arise for us.
ai-patthana2.12:228.1_1: It’s roots, stems, and defilements don’t arise in them.
ai-patthana2.12:228.1_2: The roots are to be rooted, not defilements. ...
ai-patthana2.12:229.1_0: Three others should be dealt with.
ai-patthana2.12:230.1_0: The corruption, defilements, and corruption. It is a condition for the corruption of the defilements. Compassion, for the sake of defilement, and for the object.
ai-patthana2.12:231.1_0: It’s corrupted, nor does the corruption of defilement, but not the defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:231.1_1: Or with definitely, not having absent such definitely. ...
ai-patthana2.12:231.1_2: Then two or three may be one, but three.
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_0: They are corrupted, defiled, and specified. They must drop it around without a group. There is no danger that should be seen again.
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_1: the condition being by way of preceding condition ...
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_2: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_3: the condition being by way of mutuality ...
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_4: the condition being by way of support ...
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_5: the condition being by way of strong support ...
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_6: nine things, transgressort condition, and later condition.
ai-patthana2.12:232.1_7: the condition being by way of habitual condition.
ai-patthana2.12:233.1_0: corruption, defilements, and qualities are not a condition for the corruption of the defilements. ...
ai-patthana2.12:235.1_0: corruption, defilements, and corruption. They don’t have the defiled, nor are corrupted by the defilements that lead to corruption and corruption. They don’t have a cause or condition.
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_0: the condition being by way of nutriment ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_1: the condition being by way of faculty ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_2: the condition being by way of absorption ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_3: the condition being by way of paths ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_4: the condition being by way of association ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_5: the condition being by way of presence ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_6: the condition being by way of presence condition ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_7: the condition being by way of disappearance ...
ai-patthana2.12:236.1_8: the condition being by way of non-disappearance condition ...
ai-patthana2.12:237.0.1_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana2.12:237.1_0: Nine things are the nine projects. There is a new state of existences in the ninth. Nine worldly conditions are born again and again. There is no new deeds that is born in fact produced in nine faculties. When it comes to the nine faculties, there is nine faculties in the ninth.
ai-patthana2.12:238.1_1: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana2.12:238.1_2: the condition being by way of strong support condition.
ai-patthana2.12:239.0.2_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana2.12:239.1_0: nine objects, nine orifices have come to us.
ai-patthana2.12:240.0_0: under the sway of the repetitional conditions, one lump (of the mind) is ready,
ai-patthana2.12:240.1_0: or two or three objects next to the object, but not interrupted ...
ai-patthana2.12:240.1_2: There is no sort of obstructions for the three (etc.)
ai-patthana2.12:241.1_0: Neither with the cause or reason you shouldn’t have new conditions for newly arrived monks, nor do the observance-day procedure.
ai-patthana2.12:242.1_0: The group of defilement was finished.
ai-patthana2.12:243.0.1_0: wrapped in the defilements with the defilements.
ai-patthana2.12:243.1_0: Abandoning the defilements and defilement associated with those defilements. Understanding the defilements, causes defilements and is a condition for defilement, and for views.
ai-patthana2.12:243.1_1: All the defilements are stainless and without corruption.
ai-patthana2.12:244.1_0: The defilements associated with the defilements is finished.
ai-patthana2.12:245.0.1_0: wrapped in what is the defilement of the defilements,
ai-patthana2.12:245.1_0: the defilements of defilements give rise to defilements; the corruptions without defilements. The corruptions are shaken, defilement, and phenomena; the three gives rise to the defilements. The mind gives rise to the aggregates. Corruptions of the mind and body.
ai-patthana2.12:246.1_0: Just as one would wear out a legal issue,
ai-patthana2.12:246.2_0: The group of defilements are finished.
ai-patthana2.12:247.1_0: The group of nine on the defilements is finished.
